page.title: 03WHERE DO PEOPLE WORK?
page.content: Most of the land around Woore is used for{dairy-farming.} Modern farming methods mean that very few people are employed on the land. Hay-making has practically disappeared, and most of the grass is cut for{silage.} There are shops and services in the village, and the{Phoenix Factory}in Pipe Gate, but people go outside the village to work. Most go by car. We found that more than half of the fathers were "professional". There were managers or salesmen in companies or banks. Some were teachers, some worked with computers.
